citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
*** I arrived at the facility at 10:30 am. I knocked on the door and called the owner. The owner called back stating
that they were unavailable for an inspection at that time. A responsible adult was not available to accompany
APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am on 03/03/2015. A responsible adult shall be made
available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.

narrative:
2.126
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
*** I arrived at the facility at 10:30 am. I knocked on the door and called the owner. The owner called back stating
that they were unavailable for an inspection at that time.  A responsible adult was not available to accompany
APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am on 03/03/2015.  A responsible adult shall be made
available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
